button.name: abs
button.summary: Returns the absolute value of the given number.

button.name: log
button.summary: Returns the logarithm of the given number.

button.name: pow
button.summary: Returns the power of the first arg raised on the second arg.

button.name: exp
button.summary: Returns the power of Euler's constant raised on the given arg.

button.name: min
button.summary: Returns the minimum value in the given collection.

button.name: max
button.summary: Returns the maximum value in the given collection.

button.name: sqrt
button.summary: Returns the square root of the given number.

button.name: cbrt
button.summary: Returns the cubic root of the given number.

button.name: cos
button.summary: Returns the cosine of the given angle.

button.name: sin
button.summary: Returns the sine of the given angle.

button.name: tan
button.summary: Returns the tangent of the given angle.

button.name: acos
button.summary: Returns the arc cosine of the given number.

button.name: asin
button.summary: Returns the arc sine of the given number.

button.name: atan
button.summary: Returns the arc tangent of the given number.

button.name: sinh
button.summary: Returns the hyperbolic sine of the given number.

button.name: cosh
button.summary: Returns the hyperbolic cosine of the given number.

button.name: round
button.summary: Returns the value of the given number rounded to the nearest integer.

button.name: floor
button.summary: Returns the largest integer less than or equal to the given number.

button.name: ceil
button.summary: Returns the smallest integer greater than or equal to the given number.

button.name: trunc
button.summary: Returns the integer part of the given number.

button.name: tot
button.summary: Returns the sum of the given collection.

button.name: avg
button.summary: Returns the average of the given collection.

button.name: var
button.summary: Returns the variance of the given collection.

button.name: cnt
button.summary: Returns the number of the given elements.

button.name: med
button.summary: Returns the median of the given collection.

button.name: cntIf
button.summary: Returns the number of the elements that fulfill the given condition.

button.name: stDev
button.summary: Returns the standard deviation of the given collection.

button.name: freq
button.summary: Returns the occurrences of the elements within the given collection.

button.name: kLrg
button.summary: Returns the k-largest value of the given collection.
